message: I'm excited to offer you this great product for a special price! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I can do $110, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand your concerns about making a profit, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you think about $100? That's the highest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $115, but that's my final offer.
